verses.verse: And this is the blessing <S%H1293><s%>, with which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his death <S%H4194><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and rose up <S%H2224><s%> from Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto them <S%H3313><s%>; he shined forth from mountain <S%H2022><s%> Paran <S%H6290><s%>, and he came <S%H857><s%> with ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of saints <S%H6944><s%>: from his right hand <S%H3225><s%> went a fiery <S%H799><s%> law for them <S%H1881><s%>.

Yes <S%H637><s%>, he loved <S%H2245><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>; all his saints <S%H6918><s%> are in your hand <S%H3027><s%>: and they sat down <S%H8497><s%> at your feet <S%H7272><s%>; every one shall receive <S%H5375><s%> of your words <S%H1703><s%>.
Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us a law <S%H8451><s%>, even the inheritance <S%H4181><s%> of the congregation <S%H6952><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And he was king <S%H4428><s%> in Jeshurun <S%H3484><s%>, when the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> and the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.
Let Reuben <S%H7205><s%> live <S%H2421><s%>, and not die <S%H4191><s%>; and let not his men <S%H4962><s%> be few <S%H4557><s%>.

And this is the blessing of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> him unto his people <S%H5971><s%>: let his hands <S%H3027><s%> be sufficient <S%H7227><s%> for him <S%H5828><s%>; and be you an help to him from his enemies <S%H6862><s%>.

And of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Let your Thummim <S%H8550><s%> and your Urim <S%H224><s%> be with your holy <S%H2623><s%> one <S%H376><s%>, whom you did prove <S%H5254><s%> at Massah <S%H4532><s%>, and with whom you did argue <S%H7378><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%>;

Who said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%> and to his mother <S%H517><s%>, I have not seen <S%H7200><s%> him <S%H5234><s%>; neither did he acknowledge his brothers <S%H251><s%>, nor knew <S%H3045><s%> his own sons <S%H1121><s%>: for they have observed <S%H8104><s%> your word <S%H565><s%>, and kept <S%H5341><s%> your covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

They shall teach <S%H3384><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> your law <S%H8451><s%>: they shall put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H6988><s%> before <S%H639><s%> you <S%H3632><s%>, and whole burnt sacrifice upon your altar <S%H4196><s%>.

Bless <S%H1288><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%>, his substance <S%H2428><s%>, and accept <S%H7521><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>: strike <S%H4272><s%> through the body <S%H4975><s%> of them that rise <S%H6965><s%> against him <S%H8130><s%>, and of them that hate him <S%H6965><s%>, that they rise not <S%H4480><s%> again <S%H6965><s%>.

And of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, The beloved <S%H3039><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall live <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%> by him <S%H2653><s%>; and the Lord shall cover him all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H7931><s%>, and he shall live between his shoulders <S%H3802><s%>.

And of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be his land <S%H776><s%>, for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, for the dew <S%H2919><s%>, and for the deep <S%H8415><s%> that couches beneath <S%H7257><s%>,
And for the precious <S%H4022><s%> fruits <S%H8393><s%> brought forth by the sun <S%H8121><s%>, and for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> put forth <S%H1645><s%> by the moon <S%H3391><s%>,
And for the chief things <S%H7218><s%> of the ancient <S%H6924><s%> mountains <S%H2042><s%>, and for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the lasting <S%H5769><s%> hills <S%H1389><s%>,

And for the precious things <S%H4022><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and fullness <S%H4393><s%> there <S%H7522><s%>, and for the good will of him that lived <S%H7931><s%> in the bush <S%H5572><s%>: let the blessing come <S%H935><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and upon the top of the head <S%H6936><s%> of him that was separated <S%H5139><s%> from his brothers <S%H251><s%>.

His glory <S%H1926><s%> is like the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of his bullock <S%H7794><s%>, and his horns <S%H7161><s%> are like the horns <S%H7161><s%> of unicorns <S%H7214><s%>: with them he shall push <S%H5055><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: and they are the ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and they are the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>.
And of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, in your going out <S%H3318><s%>; and <S%H3485><s%>, Issachar, in your tents <S%H168><s%>.

They shall call <S%H7121><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the mountain <S%H2022><s%>; there they shall offer <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: for they shall suck <S%H3243><s%> of the abundance <S%H8228><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and of treasures <S%H8226><s%> hid <S%H2934><s%> in the sand <S%H2344><s%>.

And of Gad <S%H1410><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that enlarges <S%H7337><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%>: he dwells <S%H7931><s%> as a lion <S%H3833><s%>, and tears <S%H2963><s%> the arm <S%H2220><s%> with <S%H637><s%> the crown of the head <S%H6936><s%>.

And he provided <S%H7200><s%> the first part <S%H7225><s%> for himself <S%H2513><s%>, because there, in a portion of the lawgiver <S%H2710><s%>, was he seated <S%H5603><s%>; and he came <S%H857><s%> with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, he executed <S%H6213><s%> the justice <S%H6666><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And of Dan <S%H1835><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Dan <S%H1835><s%> is a lion <S%H738><s%>'s whelp <S%H1482><s%>: he shall leap <S%H2187><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

And of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, O Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, satisfied <S%H7649><s%> with favor <S%H7522><s%>, and full <S%H4392><s%> with the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: possess <S%H3423><s%> you the west <S%H3220><s%> and the south <S%H1864><s%>.

And of Asher <S%H836><s%> he said <S%H559><s%>, Let Asher <S%H836><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> with sons <S%H1121><s%>; let him be acceptable <S%H7521><s%> to his brothers <S%H251><s%>, and let him dip <S%H2881><s%> his foot <S%H7272><s%> in oil <S%H8081><s%>.
Your shoes <S%H4515><s%> shall be iron <S%H1270><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%>; and as your days <S%H3117><s%>, so shall your strength be <S%H1679><s%>.

There is none like unto the God <S%H410><s%> of Jeshurun <S%H3484><s%>, who rides <S%H7392><s%> upon the heaven <S%H8064><s%> in your help <S%H5828><s%>, and in his excellency <S%H1346><s%> on the sky <S%H7834><s%>.

The eternal <S%H6924><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is your refuge <S%H4585><s%>, and underneath are the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> arms <S%H2220><s%>: and he shall thrust out <S%H1644><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H559><s%>; and shall say, Destroy them <S%H8045><s%>.

Israel <S%H3478><s%> then shall live <S%H7931><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%> alone <S%H910><s%>: the fountain <S%H5869><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be upon a land <S%H776><s%> of corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%>; also his heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall drop down <S%H6201><s%> dew <S%H2919><s%>.

Happy <S%H835><s%> are you <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel: who is like unto you <S%H5971><s%>, O people saved <S%H3467><s%> by the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your help <S%H5828><s%>, and who is the sword <S%H2719><s%> of your excellency <S%H1346><s%>! and your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall be found liars <S%H3584><s%> unto you <S%H1869><s%>; and you shall tread upon their high places <S%H1116><s%>.
